description:
Already thinking about all your spring cleaning projects? If you’re doing any painting, you may be tempted to trust swatches or the naked eye to find the right colors. But a better solution exists, and it’s called the Nix Mini 2 Color-Matching Sensor.

Mashable called this pocket-sized device “an awesome tool to feed your innate perfectionism.” Place the little piece of hardware on virtually any flat surface and it can match the color instantly to more
title: Save $40 on the ingenious Nix Mini Color Sensor

description:
Spending all day on a computer for work can be overwhelming and exhausting. You’re regularly bombarded by content you don’t care about and led down internet rabbit holes that take away precious productive time. But with Control D, you can take back control of your digital life.

This intuitive solution has earned a perfect 5-star rating on Product Hunt. With Control D, you can browse faster with enhanced security and performance, build and enforce a pr
title: Optimize your everyday workflow with Control D, now just $35 for 5 years
